file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-26-01-04 - STARTER GENERATOR MOUNTING PAD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STARTER GENERATOR MOUNTING PAD - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the APU starter/generator mounting pad. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU STARTER/GENERATOR MOUNTING ALL 49-26-01-000-801-A PAD - REMOVAL APU STARTER/GENERATOR MOUNTING ALL 49-26-01-400-801-A PAD - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-26-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-26-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU STARTER/GENERATOR MOUNTING PAD - REMOVAL A. General (1) The starter/generator mounting pad is installed on the reduction drive assembly of the APU. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400 APU STARTER/GENERATOR - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-26-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL – APU FUEL SOV. (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400, as applicable). (4) Remove the starter/generator ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the nut (3) and remove the drain hose from the mounting pad. (2) Remove the bolts (4), and washers (5), and remove the air outlet. (3) Remove nuts (2), and washers (1), and remove the starter/generator mounting pad. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-26-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Starter/Generator Mounting Pad - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 313 DET. A B 5. WASHER (4 PLACES) APU STARTER-GENERATOR MOUNTING PAD 1. WASHER (6 PLACES) 4. BOLT (4 PLACES) 2. NUT (6 PLACES) 1 O-RING APU STARTER-GENERATOR (REF.) AIR OUTLET BOLTS 3. NUT DET. B METALIC CLAMP DRAIN HOSE AIR INLET 1 TORQUE VALUE: 12.5 TO 15.2 N.m (110 TO 135 Ib.in) EM145AMM490424A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 49-26-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-26-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU STARTER/GENERATOR MOUNTING PAD - INSTALLATION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to install the starter/generator mounting pad. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400 APU STARTER GENERATOR - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque Wrench To torque the nuts available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the starter/generator mounting pad to the APU engine mounting base. (2) Install the washer (1) and nut (2) to the starter/generator mounting pad. Tighten the nuts. Refer to Figure 401 for the torque values. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-26-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the drain hose to the starter/generator mounting pad. Tighten its nut (3). (4) Put the air outlet to the starter/generator mounting pad. Install the washers (5) and bolts (4). Tighten the bolts (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the starter/generator on the mounting pad ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/ 400). (2) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400, as applicable). (3) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. (4) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 49-26-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
